column4:
__**Welcome to NotesDomine!**__
• To create new notes, simply click **"Create Note"**.
• To delete notes or add them to categories, use the buttons in the upper-right corner.
• To sort notes, use the **"Sort"** buttons above.
• To edit notes, simply click on the note you want to edit.
• To format notes, use the following: \*\***Bold**\*\*, \**Italic*\*, \~\~~~Strikethrough~~\~\~ & \_\___Underscore__\_\_, to escape formatting use "".
